text: Both of my kids attended this swim school and had a great experience. Coach Xiao Yun and coach Wen Feng are incredibly dedicated and patient, taking the time to work with each child at their own pace. My kids felt comfortable and confident in the water, and their skills improved noticeably. Highly recommend!

Saw my daughter improve by leaps and bounds since joining APS at ACJC about 7 months ago.
